response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would also be a significant asset for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you might be $800,000, but we hope you'll see the additional value in securing such a high-quality product at an advantageous rate. We look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this product could benefit you further. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us.", "product_price": 950000}
